title: Transition away from coal not happening in the near future: Govt
description: In India, the transition away from coal or Just Transition is not happening in the foreseeable future, coal and mines minister Pralhad Joshi told the Parliament on Monday. He added that in due course some mines may close because of exhaustions of reserves but new coal blocks will replace them to meet demand.
